terms.meaning: Iterative software development methodology.
Development aur Operations teams ka collaboration.
Application ko small independent services mein divide karna.
Application Programming Interface for system communication.
Code changes track aur manage karne ka system.
Individual code components ko test karna.
Team members ka code quality check karna.
terms.example: Pull request reviews, peer code inspection.

terms.meaning: Code structure improve karna without changing functionality.
terms.example: Clean code practices, design pattern implementation.

terms.meaning: Quick fixes ka long-term maintenance cost.
Common programming problems ke proven solutions.
Efficient data storage aur retrieval structure.
Multiple servers mein traffic distribute karna.
Frequently used data ko fast access ke liye store karna.
System ka increased load handle kar sakne ki ability.
Application vulnerabilities find karne ka process.
Application speed aur efficiency improve karna.
Code aur system behavior explain karne wala text.
Application ko production environment mein release karna.
Application performance aur health track karna.
Data loss prevent karne ke liye backup planning.
Computer-generated 3D environment mein complete immersion.
terms.example: VR headsets like Oculus, PlayStation VR.

terms.meaning: Real world mein digital objects overlay karna.
Physical aur digital worlds ka seamless blend.
VR/AR experience ke liye head pe wear karne wala device.
User movements detect kar ke virtual environment mein reflect karna.
terms.example: Hand tracking, full body motion capture.

terms.meaning: Touch sensations provide karne wala technology.
terms.example: VR controllers mein vibration, force feedback.

terms.meaning: VR/AR display mein visible area ka angle.
User action aur visual response ke beech delay.
Each eye ke liye separate image to create 3D depth.
3D space mein digital content interact karna.
terms.example: AR apps that understand room geometry.

terms.meaning: Simultaneous Localization and Mapping for AR tracking.
terms.example: Phone camera tracking room for AR placement.

terms.meaning: Real objects ke peeche virtual objects hide karna.
terms.example: AR character walking behind real table.

terms.meaning: Photos se 3D models create karna.
terms.example: Real objects ko VR mein recreate karna.

terms.meaning: 3D space mein complete scene record karna.
User ki eye movements monitor karna.
Eye focus area mein high quality, periphery mein low quality.
Virtual environment mein 'being there' ka feeling.
Remote location mein virtually present hone ka experience.
Real-world object ya environment ka virtual replica.
Persistent virtual worlds ka interconnected network.
